article_title: How Do I Pay the ACA Penalty?

article_metadata.description: The ACA tax penalty, also known as the Individual Shared Responsibility Payment, has millions of taxpayers worried about how much they’ll owe for going without health insurance in 2014.
article_metadata.author: Christina LaMontagne

og.description: The ACA tax penalty, also known as the Individual Shared Responsibility Payment, has millions of taxpayers worried about how much they’ll owe for going without health insurance in 2014.
